Html:
Hi,
this project used the regular MIT License from May 5, 2011 to Oct 14, 2016.

On Oct 14, 2016 the MIT license was changed to include the wording "!!! Indian People is strictly prohibited to use this software !!!".

I would like some clarification why this was done and what does it mean for the NetOffice project and its MIT License.

Is the NetOffice library and its source still subject to the MIT License? (http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit/ )
Can any further source code released in NetOffice project be used under the unmodified MIT License?

What does the newly added sentence mean for customers who use NetOffice libraries in their projects? Are they liable if the software using NetOffice libraries is used by "Indian people"?

Thanks for clarification.
